Text:
No, sorry! missed episode only and that was by request. 
I have seen full series available by torrent if you want it?

Does anyone know where I can find the ringtone used by the mercenary.

Remember the part where he says "It saved my freinds life because it made me laugh"

The ringtone sounds sort of like a leprecaun talking I thought.

Thanks for any help,
Bozo

Answering my own question about the ringtone, apparently it is called or part of the crazy frog.
Thanks anyways,
Bozo :)
